translations: v．狼吞虎咽地吃：快速且贪婪地吃东西。
· He gobbled up his dinner in no time.
他很快就狼吞虎咽地吃完了晚餐。

sentences.sentence: Pete gobbled all the beef stew.
sentences.translation: 皮特狼吞虎咽地吃完了所有的炖牛肉。

sentences.sentence: They gobbled down all the sandwiches.
sentences.translation: 他们几口就把三明治全吃光了。

sentences.sentence: Hotel costs gobbled up most of their holiday budget.
sentences.translation: 住宿旅馆的费用耗掉他们假日预算的一大部分。
